comments.body:
Could it be ``noarch: python`` ?
```suggestion
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "
  noarch: python
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "
  noarch: python
